message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is about aspect-based sentiment analysis (ABSA) using a novel variant of LSTM called aspect-aware LSTM (AA-LSTM). The paper focuses on improving the context modeling process by incorporating aspect information into LSTM cells before the attention mechanism. This topic falls under the natural language processing (NLP) domain, which is typically categorized under cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves machine learning techniques for sentiment analysis, which can be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, the paper involves information retrieval techniques for analyzing text data, which can be categorized under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper proposes a new LSTM variant that can dynamically produce aspect-aware contextual representations, which can be categorized under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
